text: Bill Henson (born 7 October 1955)NGV. Retrieved 8 February 2014 is an Australian art photographer. Bill Henson's works provoked a controversy; at one of his exhibitions, police found images of nude teenagers. Police first wanted to charge Henson for child pornography, but then did not. Instead, the exhibition was rated "parental guidance". This means that people under 16 should be accompanied by their parents. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Australian photographers Category:People from Melbourne Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Artists from Victoria (Australia)
title: Bill Henson
